name: Metawar
description:
In a small town containing a one-tank army Whose duty it is to keep the city from  the enemy attack and to confront them for the  Further destruction of its city                          

- This  game made for METAFAB jam build in unity and web3 using Metafab API,

- Your Goal Is To Defeat 200 Of Enemies That Will Attack Your City and With Time They Will Be Stronger So You Will Have To Upgrade Your Tank With [GOLDs] YouCollect From The Enemies And Upgrade Your Tank  From Workshop And Come Back To Battle.

- Tank Base

    You have 5 Levels to upgrade

- Turret

    You have 10 Levels to upgrade

- Solider

   You Have 3 Levels to Upgrade

- Ammo

    You have 8 Levels to Upgrade 

 

Team

FuadDev : Development  (Unity & C#)

RFares: Art   (Photoshop)
